testsuite.name: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: When I open the Search User page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: Then I check if user "sam" exists, if not, I create the user
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: Then I am on the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: When I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: Then I launch the "Improvised A1" assignment in "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: When I submit the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: Then I see the submission report with warning text "Warning: There appears to be errors in one or more of your answers."
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: When I submit the assignment again
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: Then my score 0 out of 1 (0 %) is shown in a grade report
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: And I save and quit assignment to clear assignment state
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: And I am back on the "Demonstration Class" class homepage window
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: When I navigate to the "Class Grades" in "Gradebook" of current class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Grades page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: And I select "Improvised A1 - Homework/Quiz" in "Assignments" selection list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: And I select "Other users with grades" in "List" selection list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: And I put "qa" in the "User" input box
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: And I click the Search button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: When I click the grade for the selected assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: Then I see the test record details of "Improvised A1" for user "qa"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: And I see my total score "0/1.0"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: And I do not see the edit total score button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: And I do not see the Delete Record button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Complete assignment normally, check that edit and delete buttons are not visible
